text: [Chapter 26a][Sector 5, Shadow Realm Research Center]
Death Pepper: Proton...
Death Pepper: I've heard much about you, and you've causedus a lot of trouble...
Death Pepper: I don't understand though, why would you returnhere after all of these years?
Proton: We can't let you have the Holy Itucher, you'll surelydestroy the world as we know it.
Proton: And this is revenge for what you've done to Specians and the Xuirs.
Death Pepper: What I've done to the Xuirs?
Death Pepper: The only thing I've done for the Xuirs is help them.
Proton: What do you mean?
Death Pepper: The Proto-Xuirs are a pained existence, an incomplete and failedlife form.
Death Pepper: The Proto-Xuirs will only be free once a complete Xuir is created,the lifeform that they were meant to be!
Proton: Being incomplete doensn't devalue your existence. This is just an excuseto justify your actions.
Death Pepper: It doesn't? Well, take a look at this...
Death Pepper: What do you think of this, Proton?
Proton: You're... a Proto-Xuir?
Death Pepper: Why do you think I've dedicated myself to the XuirResearch?
Death Pepper: I am an incomplete creation of the past researchers, an existenceof failure.
Death Pepper: This existence is pain. Proton, surely you've considered thefact that you were the result of unsuccessful experiements, that your veryexistence is a literal embodiment of failure.
Death Pepper: I wish to fix this failure, no matter the cost.
Death Pepper: I will create the being that were supposed to be, the onethat we could've been...
Death Pepper: And only then, will be free from our burden of an failed existenceand be able to die in the peace of knowing that our failure had been fixed.
Death Pepper: We must fix our existence, Proton.
Proton: ...
Death Pepper: Sadly, it seems you do not understand.
Death Pepper: Like the others, all who oppose me must be defeated in the sakeof mending our existence.
Death Pepper: Why... why.. must this happen...
Death Pepper: The Xuir... must be... completed...
Proton: Everyone, search the area.
Proton: The Holy Itucher should be somewhere around here.
[Chapter 27a][Sector 5, Shadow Realm Research Center]
